entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 p.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies late this afternoon. Local smoke. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies this evening. Local smoke. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
